4107253232588430209.Text: While in the St. Olms area of Vivec, I heard rumors about a woman whose husband has been missing for days. The woman's name is Moroni Uvelas.

4851258222445215670.Text: I have spoken to Moroni Uvelas about her missing husband. It seems the man was somewhat of a skooma addict, and the woman believes that in one of his skooma-induced wanderings, he may have contracted corprus.

3027628809210081399.Text: I have agreed to try and find her husband Danar, and cure him if I can. He was last seen heading into the underworks near St. Olms.

3620282402264914284.Text: I have decided not to become involved in this incident. The fate of a diseased skooma addict is not my concern.

2152718379607828625.Text: I've killed a corprus stalker in the Underworks of Vivec. I fear this is what Danar Uvelas has become.

30755319342640224073.Text: I returned to Moroni Uvelas with her husband's ring. She was saddened by the news of her husband's fate, but did not seem surprised. She was grateful that he was finally put to rest, and rewarded me with some potions of that will cure disease.

2604426899848126249.Text: The Short Unhappy Life of Danar Uvelas
